entry.title: 2014 in Review
entry.content:
I’ve seen a lot of people talk about how difficult 2014 was for them, and I must admit, it’s been a pretty stressful year for me too. From quitting my job to putting on a conference to the Mozilla stuff and then travelling for seven months… it’s been hectic.

I’ve visited four new countries (Netherlands, Czech Republic, Austria and Mexico), stayed in many new cities (Prague, Stockholm, Vienna, Philadelphia, Raleigh, and Los Angeles – to name a few), and far too many airports.

I’m definitely looking forward to this upcoming year. It’s filled with a lot of promise.

Here’s some of the things I’ve enjoyed this year.

Films

  1. Guardians of the Galaxy
  2. The Babadook
  3. Gone Girl

Honorable mentions for Edge of Tomorrow and The Grand Budapest Hotel.

TV Episodes

  1. The Mountain and the Viper (Game of Thrones, S4 E8)
  2. Guest (The Leftovers, S1 E6)
  3. Buridan’s Ass (Fargo, S1 E6)

Books

  1. The Goldfinch by Donna Tartt
  2. Tenth of December by George Saunders
  3. Hyperion by Dan Simmons

Songs

I haven’t listened to that many albums, so I’m just doing songs this year.

  1. Queen - Perfume Genius
  2. Hunger of the Pine - alt-J
  3. The Way He Looks At Me - Trent Reznor & Atticus Ross (from the Gone Girl soundtrack)

Moments

  1. Drinking with old friends at Nightjar in London
  2. Seeing Cabaret on Broadway (and just generally living in New York)
  3. Eating at La Degustation in Prague
  4. Visiting Disneyland and California’s Great Adventure

entry.title: 2013 in Review
entry.content:
Here’s a quick list of some of the things this year that I enjoyed the most. The films, TV episodes, music and moments are all chosen from 2013. However, as I mainly read “older” books this year, the books were from whenever – I just read them this year.

Films

  1. Gravity
  2. You’re Next
  3. Star Trek Into Darkness

TV Episodes

  1. Ozymandias (Breaking Bad, S5 E14)
  2. The Rains of Castamere (Game of Thrones, S3 E09)
  3. In The Flesh (mini-series)

Books

  1. The Luminaries by Eleanor Catton
  2. I, Claudius by Robert Graves
  3. The Crying of Lot 49 by Thomas Pynchon

Albums

  1. Random Access Memories - Daft Punk
  2. Yeezus - Kanye West
  3. Trouble Will Find Me - The National

Songs

  1. Get Lucky - Daft Punk
  2. Retrograde - James Blake
  3. Joan of Arc - Arcade Fire

Moments

  1. The death of DOMA/Prop 8 being struck down, and subsequent marriage
  2. Getting a green card
  3. Cruise to Alaska and Glacier Bay National Park
